item.title: Canada Releases New Smoking Cessation Guideline for Adults
item.description: The document offers a menu of options to help adults quit smoking tobacco. Medscape Medical News

item.title: Very Abnormal Results Rare in DMARD Toxicity Monitoring
item.description: Even for adverse effects that do occur, prevention typically is not possible using long-term routine lab monitoring. Medscape Medical News

item.title: Probiotics Can Reduce Heart Disease Risk Factors
item.description: Certain probiotics can lower cholesterol, reduce inflammation, and support better heart and circulatory health. Medscape Medical News

item.description: Canadian doctors are using higher methadone doses without rapid titration, risking loss to follow up and fentanyl overdose, researchers say. Medscape ...

item.title: BRCA Carriers Conceive After Pregnancy-Related Breast Cancer
item.description: Over a third of young BRCA carriers who are diagnosed with breast cancer during pregnancy conceive again without adverse maternal or foetal outcomes, ...
